title: Sell runes
body: I would like to ask u guys about how I can sell all my "Runes" in game cuz they are Tier 1 and 2, so I wanna sell them all and get all Tier 3. Thank you.

replies.body: You can't exactly "sell" your runes, but if you've reached the rune cap and can't buy anymore you can shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can get those Tier 1 and Tier 2 runes removed for you.

There isn't a way to sell runes unfortunately. 

During the Runes Reforged update in November, you'll be able to obtain Runes without a cost.
